title: How it Happened
transcript:
[Cueball and his friend standing.]
Cueball: Then she put her hands over mine, grinds against me, leans down and whispers, "After tonight, we go and live our lives, no regrets. But I want this, I want you, one last time."Friend: (Giving a thumbs up, pointing, surrounded by action lines)
That's what SHE said![Both continue to stand.]
Cueball: Yes. Yes, it is.[Both continue to stand.]
